summary: TAKATA RECALL (POTENTIALLY - MY NOTICE DOESN'T SAY SPECIFICALLY).  I RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE EARLY THIS YEAR THAT SAID I WOULD BE RECEIVING A SECOND LETTER BY THE END OF APRIL FOR REPLACEMENT PARTS FOR THE "FRONT PASSENGER AIR BAG INFLATOR". IT IS NOW THE END OF JUNE, AND I HAVEN'T RECEIVED THE LETTER. I AM CURRENTLY UNABLE TO USE MY PASSENGER SEAT DUE TO THIS. IT ALSO SEEMS THERE IS A DANGER TO ME CONTINUING TO DRIVE THE CAR.
